text: Zoraida Bux贸 Santiago (born 1963) is a Puerto Rican Republican politician who has been the Shadow United States Senator since 2021. As a shadow Senator, Bux贸 is in charge of convincing the U.S. Congress to make Puerto Rico the 51st state of the Union. In October 2024, Bux贸 announced her support of former President Donald Trump at a campaign rally in Allentown, Pennsylvania. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:United States Shadow senators from Puerto Rico Category:Politicians from San Juan, Puerto Rico Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
